website_summaries.verdict: A conveniently packaged gift that anyone can enjoy.
pros: Single card comes with an Amazon gift card attached
Gift cards have no fees or expiration dates
Multiple denominations are available to choose from
Blank interior leaves plenty of room for a personal message
cons: Gift cards do not show the price, which can get confusing when ordering multiples with different balances

customer_reviews.title: NEVER EVEN GOT TO USE THIS GIFT CARD!
customer_reviews.text: I never even got to use this. They took my money and never gave me the gift card! AMAZON TOOK MY MONEY & NEVER PUT IT ON THE GIFT CARD!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Always a crowd pleaser, but can you do $18 and $36 for bar and bat mitzvahs?
customer_reviews.text: We love giving Amazon gift cards to friends and family for their birthdays. Small request: can you do them in multiples of $18 for bar and bat mitzvahs? Even just $18, $36 and $180 would be enough. In Judaism, the letters in the Hebrew word for "life" have a numeric value of 18 (Hebrew letters are associated with a number, kind of like Roman numerals). So it's traditional to give gifts of $18 or $36 (a "double life," so to speak) to commemorate rites of passage.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Rothfeld

customer_reviews.title: Really!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So, I purchased 40 of these and when I received them most of the envelopes had spilled coffee all over them. I appreciate we all have accidents, but seriously how hard would it have been to replace the envelopes. Lynn B
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Option
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a way to give an Amazon Gift Card as a wedding shower present. In this case I thought it a little tacky to print my own, and I was out of colored ink. I found this option on the Amazon website. I was able to find an appropriate card, and as a Prime member the greeting card with gift card attached was delivered to my home the next day. I will definitely take advantage of this gift option again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: FAJ

customer_reviews.title: Gift Cards Already Redeemed! Buyers Beware
customer_reviews.text: Two out of five $100 gift cards have already been redeemed! I'M LIVID!! Apparently, this is common based on other reviews. I stock up on Amazon gift cards and give them out throughout the year for various occasions. Amazon Customer Service was no help. No, I didn't redeem them. No, I didn't give them to anyone else. They were sealed in the Amazon envelopes before opening to write a message. It's embarrassing to give a gift and then being told it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: angelwings010

customer_reviews.title: Refund to my bank account
customer_reviews.text: To whom this concerns, I purchased two $100.00 gift cards in September 2017. I tried to use them for a purchase a few days ago and it said they had been redeemed. I haven't used them so I would like for you to deposit both 100.00 moneys back to my bank account last week. Thank you, Angela Thibodeaux
customer_reviews.author: angela thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived but no idea who sent it!
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to order this gift card for quick delivery but something went wrong. I wrote a short & lovely note to go with the gift and it arrived without the personal note, nothing. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Crosland

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had to cancel as it was not deliverable in one day as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Inez

customer_reviews.title: Amazon advertised "purchase a Fit bit and get a free ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazon advertised "purchase a Fit bit and get a free $50 giftcard" so i did it. Short story, I paid for the free gift card due to some technicality. After three previous, ascerted by Amazon reps, technicalities didn't stick, I finally got tired on about the fourth possible reason and just quit trying. This is not a shade throwing message; at least not a conventional one. Thank you, Amazon! Your "fine print" broke the spell on me. I can now take my little money and save it. We still have a relationship but we gonna be healthier about it, babe.
customer_reviews.author: No Heck For El

customer_reviews.title: Oops
customer_reviews.text: The card did not have the sender's name on it so that when the recipient received this gift, she thought it was a hoax. Instead of pleasure, the gift caused my friend lots of stress. When one signs up for the gift card, the online site should make giving purchaser's information clear for the recipient unless the sender wants the card to be anonymous.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Great last minute gift and one-day shipping is FREE!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a gift card but don't want to seem like a last minute thinker or want to have a better presentation then purchase this! It's an Amazon gift card (you pick the denomination) and it comes securely affixed to the inside of a greeting card. The great thing is One Day Shipping is FREE! I ordered around Noon on a Thursday and received it Friday morning. Amazon shipping makes it so convenient especially if you don't have time to run out and purchase a gift. Quick note: If you have a gift card balance on your Amazon account you CANNOT purchase an Amazon gift card with those funds. It has to be another form of payment.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo-chan

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters birthday. She waited 8 months to use it as she was moving at the time. This card is supposed to never expire. However, when she tried to use it, it wouldnt work. First was told it was deactivated. Then was told someone else used it, which was impossible as she kept the card locked up until she tried to use it. Now I cant get a refund. They say its past the return window. Im not returning anything! A card that does not expire should be guaranteed to work whenever you decide to use it! I would like a card that works or my money back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary La'mimi

customer_reviews.title: Pink Flowers is Better than the bookmarks for graduation
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Gift card itself is attractive. I wish the Amazon emblem wasn't front-and-center, but it's okay. Perhaps it helps make the gift understandable right away. (No - it's not going to say the amount. You'll have to do that or just trust that the person can look it up.) I considered the bookmarks, frankly, since this was for graduation, but anyone with a pair of scissors could have a couple nice bookmarks from this if that's what they really wanted. It's got more "to" it than the other gift card options Amazon offers, with excellent quality, slick cardstock.
customer_reviews.author: lil

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Amazon gift card to give as an Engagement gift. Party is this Saturday the 24th...Card delivered today. Packaging substandard..seems as though it was run over or wet when delivered. Had to throw actual card with sentiment away not suitable to give with gift card...gift card not as presentable as other Amazon cards which I purchased and gave as gifts in the past. Plain black almost cardboard like. Would not purchase from this party again very dissatisfied ! Lucy Hyde
customer_reviews.author: lucy hyde

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to get a convenient gift for an 18 year old and this was so easy! The gift card comes nicely in the card and in a delivery envelope, but you still get an envelope to gift the card. The happy birthday card I ordered was really nice and considering it was basically 'free' with the $20 gift card I bought.So nice you don't have to go and buy a card/envelope for the gift card. So easy! Thanks amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: No value indicated on gift card!
customer_reviews.text: The value of the gift card is not indicated anywhere on the the card, like other years! Poor quality control! How is the recipient supposed to know what the value is? Could be cheap knock-offs that can’t be redeemed! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: karenk

customer_reviews.title: My wife said "thanks"
customer_reviews.text: This arrived as part of an order, arriving at home before the actual item I ordered. I assume it was very gift-able because my wife had no problem accepting and using it. She said it was already applied to her Amazon account when I arrived home so it was easy to use? Only the remnants of paper and packaging in the trash were proof it had ever existed. Presentation posed no issues. Although it arrived in a birthday card when it wasn't her birthday, she thanked me for the 8 month early gift and continued browsing on her phone to purchase things, so...I guess that worked too!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Greeting Card and Envelope Were Nasty
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon gift card itself was fine, but the greeting card and envelope arrived with a large grease stain on both of them which was very noticeable. The yellow shipping envelope was fine, but I'm very disappointed that Amazon quality control would ship this out in this condition. I ended up sending the gift card in a greeting card I had.
customer_reviews.author: Kaysmo

customer_reviews.title: Instructions not obvious
customer_reviews.text: Amazon gift cards are a great way to do your holiday giving. The gift card comes attached inside a very generic but tasteful holiday card. The difficulty I had was that the 17 holiday cards I ordered came inside individual envelopes. The instructions on the outside of each envelop were not obvious enough to make me feel comfortable about opening each one to find that the card and it's envelop were inside. I was worried that once I opened the outer envelop that there would be no envelop for the card. There was, problem solved :)
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Greeting card arrived bent up in a padded envelope.
customer_reviews.text: Based on the Amazon product photos, I thought the presentation would be better. The greeting card is very thin and cheap, and comes with plain white envelope. It arrived bent and folded inside its padded shipping envelope. I already unglued the Amazon gift card and put it into a much more attractive gift card holder that I already had on hand. I would never order a gift card packaged this way again and I would definitely not give this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This card didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. Watch the fine print, this is not through Amazon so you won't get customer service from them!!!! I bought two cards, one worked the other didn't. Guess you have a 50-50 chance of getting a working card.
customer_reviews.author: Mm2

customer_reviews.title: I consider this Gift Card in a Greeting Card to ...
customer_reviews.text: I consider this Gift Card in a Greeting Card to be among the most thoughtful gifts a person can give and/or receive for Christmas and birthdays. It allows the receiver to purchase a gift of his or her choosing up to the designated amount. Too many people receive presents at Christmas and other times during the year that they cannot use and end up returning or giving it away. Be thoughtful and give an Amazon gift card!
customer_reviews.author: billya1951

customer_reviews.title: Offer not honered
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few of these as Christmas gifts. Saw an offer for a $ credit to my account upon purchase. Once purchased I received an email stating that the $ credit would be applied to my next qualifying purchase. I went to my account and saw a message that stated " I did not qualify for this offer". I probably would have still bought the gift cards but felt that I was taken advantage of. I will be doing much of my shopping elsewhere at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Sean T

customer_reviews.title: I received a totally different design from what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a card with birthday cupcakes. The one I received is not exactly what I had in mind - but at least it's a birthday card!
customer_reviews.author: Nfitz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this card and gift card except the card does not have the amount on the outside. I took a magic marker and wrote in the amount and it smeared. I ended up having to mark it out, which looks terrible and wrote it under the card which looks so tacky. Also the card it paper instead of plastic. It just looks cheap and I am giving it as a graduation gift. Wish I would have attached a picture, but it's in the envelope and sealed. I received another one today for a birthday gift and it was plastic with the amount on it. Looks so much better.
customer_reviews.author: karensny

customer_reviews.title: Poor order process design
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find denominations I wanted in a card I liked ended up getting the wrong cards. I'll use the gift cards myself but not happy that the ordering process was so poorly designed. You can't simply choose a card design and then choose the denomination - if you change denominations, it automatically switches to a different card.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Its Twins!!
customer_reviews.text: Good deal,delivered the next day at no charge for delivery. The only thing and why I didnt give 5 stars there was no name on ghe card. ....they had no idea who sent it, other than that perfect.
customer_reviews.author: N.Howell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to mail a gift card and let the person pick what he most likes, rather than guess and give a gift that one dislikes or can't use and stores away. I've purchases many for Birthdays, Christmas and Anniversaries and never been disappointed. I really like having so many varieties of cards fronts to choose from, so good for many different ages. Happy, happy, happy!!
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Delivery Directions!!
customer_reviews.text: Why offer delivery instructions when you never ever follow them. I simply want my packages left within 2’ of front door, protected from weather & Biden from passers by. This use to be typical. But over the past year, packages have been left and run over in front my garage door or left at the outer edge of porch for everyone to see and open to the heat and rain of Texas weather. WHY CANT THIS BE CORRECTED!!!! This particular delivery was bent and damaged.. not something worth gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Description says "Free Shipping" but evidently not
customer_reviews.text: I tried to get in to make a personal contact with an Amazon Rep but unable to find a way to e-mail. A little disappointed that many of the gift cards state "Free Shipping" (including the two I purchased) but then I could not find a way to eliminate the $7.10 shipping charge I was billed. Very misleading... I'll have to remember to pick up my gift cards next time.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: My card arrived on time, but was disappointed when the card was all bent due to flimsy packaging. Will be keeping, but can't use the wedding card. Next time I will purchase a more sturdy container.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: No fee for this card
customer_reviews.text: I like the seasonal card. It will make a pretty presentation. I like that there are no fees associated with them. UPDATE: Not only are the amounts not on the card, but when I called to find out the amounts, they were unable to help me. Now I have a mess.
customer_reviews.author: N. Leitner

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love Amazon but disappointed in the gift card. The card itself is okay (nothing special) but the actual $ gift card is not a card at all!!! It is a shiny cardboard card. Can we get any cheaper?!! Maybe this cardboard card is the new environmentally friendly version but it was not clear in the description. This presentation did not meet my expectations. It is like picking up a glass of water and thinking you are going to drink water and getting a gulp of milk. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Rita C

customer_reviews.title: A true shopping time saver.
customer_reviews.text: I love these Amazon gift cards. They have solved my shopping worries. I am always afraid that I will buy someone a gift that they will not like or do not need. Everyone that I know is an Amazon shopper. These gift cards arrive attached inside an attractive greeting card. Birthdays, Christmas, Weddings, Anniversaries or whatever Amazon has you covered. They allow your friends and family to choose their own gift.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Greeting cards damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these greeting cards with gift cards inside as teacher gifts. But Amazon shipped them in a soft mailer and a few of them got folded in shipment, so they look terrible! I'll have to take the gift cards out and put them in other greeting cards - which defeats the purpose of why I ordered them. I'm disappointed and would not recommend these - just buy the gift cards themselves.
customer_reviews.author: JessM

customer_reviews.title: Fine, but...
customer_reviews.text: As a gift card, the fact that it came in a little bent made it feel cheap. I am sure that the recipient was able to use the card, but again, for a gift, it was below my expectations. Also, it was delivered to the wrong address.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz Lightyear

customer_reviews.title: Nearly the worst Amazon purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Left off the message. Recipient didn't know who the card came from. Smooth move idiots. Clumsy purchase method. Didn't let me pick the format I wanted. Nearly the worst Amazon purchase ever.
customer_reviews.author: Burton W. Deane, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT EXCELLENT AMAZON DELIVERY NEEDS IMPROVEMENT
customer_reviews.text: This was my second order of these gift cards to be used as tips for extra helpful building staff during this pandemic and my quarantine/isolation. The first order of ten gift cards was properly delivered to my mail box. This second order of ten gift cards was thrown in an Amazon box with an order of beverages. This increased the risk of loss of these cards and posed a security risk if these cards went undetected and subsequently fell into the wrong hands and were mis-used.
customer_reviews.author: AllergicCatLover

customer_reviews.title: You don't even need to buy a card and an envelope, all included!
customer_reviews.text: I mean what's not to love? Got a couple to give out as Christmas gifts and they arrived I think in a day. I like that they come fixed in a card w/envelope and you don't have to worry about buying those things as well. People say gift cards are generic gifts, and they may be, but whatever, I would want this, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: KWalker17

customer_reviews.title: So Easy and You Don't Even Have to Buy a Greeting Card Because It's Included!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect gift! I give a $25 gift card to all my nine-year-old's friends for their birthdays. They all love to go Amazon and get exactly what they want. It also comes attached to a greeting card so you don't even have to buy a greeting card. I put it in a birthday-themed cellophane bag with a ribbon attached and then wrap that in tissue and put it in a gift bag. Everyone loves the gift presentation. Awesome easy choice for tweens!
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON SHOPPER 123

customer_reviews.title: Nice Presentation of Gift Card!
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal way to present a Christmas gift card! The greeting card is large, 5" x 7", with Christmas trees design on front and miniature trees pictured again inside the card, in the lower left corner, allowing plenty of space to write a personal greeting on the inside left; the actual gift card is inside, affixed to the upper right side of the card with space underneath to write your greeting and name as well! Nice quality card!
customer_reviews.author: Benita Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Could Be Better!
customer_reviews.text: I buy a lot of Amazon gift cards, this one is just okay, definitely not one I would repeat purchase . The card is pretty generic looking and I am disappointed the value is not listed on the actual gift card. The receiver has to go to Amazon to look up the amount of the gift. Overall, I am disappointed with the packaging compared to all the other wonderful, non-wedding, options.
customer_reviews.author: SonyaD

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased giftcards from Amazon before and have been happy in the past. This time however, my note to the recipient was not included so the person had no idea who sent them the giftcard. She literally thought Amazon was "just being nice". I spent the last month asking her if she got the card we sent for their new baby. So what should have been a straight forward gift to let the expecting couple know we were thinking of them became some aggravated stalking session and me thinking Amazon or FedEx screwed me out of my money. Thanks Amazon for making my easy peasy gift a pain in the rear.
customer_reviews.author: Amber A.

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about Amazon. I buy a lot of stuff at Amazon and I am always happy. Just one thing bothered me about these gift cards. I bought six $100 gift cards and they did not have the $100 value printed on the card. Last year, $100 was printed plainly on the card. To me, that is very important. No. 1....It looks much better to have $100 printed right on the card. No. 2...When it's not printed on the card there's always that doubt from the receiver......"How much is really on this card ?" You can do better. I'm sure $100 is one of the most common value card purchased. Next year PRINT $100 RIGHT ON THE CARD.
customer_reviews.author: CLIFF HENNIG

customer_reviews.title: THE ENVELOPES WERE SEALED!  No way to write message or sign them!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone likes to get an Amazon gift card, and in a Christmas card is a great idea, so I ordered several to hand out as gifts, but when I received them, the ENVELOPES WERE SEALED! Now, without going out and buying new envelopes, I have no way to write a message in them or sign the cards to let people know who they are from! The description should say "IN A SEALED ENVELOPE"!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Love Cats, Give Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Most of my family want Amazon gift cards for Christmas, and having one featuring a cat on the outside is cute and fits my status of having 3 cats of my own, so my family knows I am a "cat" person. Very cute and arrives well-packaged so it doesn't bend or get torn. I have gifted this same card over many years of Christmas holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Leyland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We bought this after we forgot about someone's quickly approaching birthday. We were shocked we got it the next day (ordering it in the late afternoon). While we're close to big city, and the speed may not be the same for people further out, the delivery promptness was impressive. The card is nice and sturdy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute wedding card
customer_reviews.text: I like that i could get a gift card for wedding inside a wedding card. You have to write your own verse, but wasn't hard to do. Inside has picture of flower and fuschia colored amazon card. I wish they would print amount of card on the amazon card. Card is very colorful and attractive. A colored envelope would be even nicer.
customer_reviews.author: bfly1102

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone who's hard to buy for
customer_reviews.text: This is a standard gift for my son who lives 1000's of miles away. He loves to read and can also use it on basic clothing. Amazon is so easy to order from and they have almost everything. Christmas shopping for my son is done within minutes and he loves the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Luciearl

customer_reviews.title: Cheap paper card
customer_reviews.text: If you're going for a quick and simple card, this is good. If you want it to look nice, use something else. I expected the card to be a bit more heavier weight, the inside is roomy so you can write whatever you like but it has a very non-personal, off the mill, I'm too lazy to buy a card and a gift card" feel to it. 2 stars at best.
customer_reviews.author: SirZed

customer_reviews.title: The card was cute but...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these gift cards and it came all crinkled and messed up, I’m sure the GC itself is usable but I certainly can’t use the card it came with. It appears UPS just shoved it into my mailbox to make it fit, why not brought to front door step? Most likely will not be buying GC online anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mommaof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and saves time and money
customer_reviews.text: I always keep a few at hand. The cards look great and everyone uses Amazon. The cards themselves arrive quickly and save me the trouble or expense of buying a gift card. Simply select a gift card appropriate for the occasion, gift it and restock when needed. No need to shop for gifts or gift bags. It does not get any easier than this.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent_Amazon_Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: The perfect gift. Recipients always love getting an Amazon gift card! It means they can get something the actually want! Coming in a greeting card means they can't immediately surmise that it is a gift card... "Ah, Just another greeting card."..then pleasantly surprised when they open it! In the event that you procrastinated a bit too long, the fast and free two day shipping is a great plus too!
customer_reviews.author: JustAnotherEarthling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift Card & Greeting Card
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This Gift Card & Greeting Card is very generic, but an excellent value. It's made of moderate quality materials with vibrant colors. Cons: Amazon has much better Gift Cards available, some are actually include brand name Greeting Cards. This item is delivered in an envelope, so the possibility exists that it can be delivered less than perfect. Quality: Excellent Value: Excellent Attention To Detail: Good
customer_reviews.author: Jamie G

customer_reviews.title: This makes buying a gift VERY easy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to Amazon, you can purchase an Amazon gift card to go in a matching greeting card making giving gifts very easy. The receivers are delighted and truly appreciate being able to use it how they want. I've done this twice now for wedding presents. The cards are beautiful and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY - GIFT CARD ALREADY USED
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this. I thought it was from Amazon but it's not. What you don't realize until someone goes to use the gift card is that the code on the back has already been scratched off and the card has already been redeemed and is worthless. Money down the drain. If someone from #Amazon want's to contact me I will gladly give the code, hopefully it can be tracked as to who used the gift card.
customer_reviews.author: shopper anon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s teacher and it worked out great. The inside of the card was blank, so my daughter and I had plenty of room to write a note to her teacher. It also came with an envelope (thank goodness) because I didn’t have one lying around the house. I will purchase this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: GIFT CARD NEEDS THE VALUE OF CARD PRINTED ON CARD SO RECEPIENT KNOWS WHAT IT IS WORTH!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was VERY DISSATISFIED with this gift card. It did NOT have the amount of the card printed anywhere on the card. Since this obviously is a gift to someone, it would be necessary for them to find out how much they had to spend on this card. There are several steps to go through to find out what the card is worth. What a disappointment for me (the giver) and for them (the receiver). Why not just print the value ON THE CARD? Amazon could do better than this!
customer_reviews.author: judy rosenblatt

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This card was very cheap and unusable. The gift card did not have the amount identified on the card, making it difficult for the recipient to see what they received. The gift card was "glued" to the inside of the greeting card which had fallen off and the gift card was loose and would easily fall out and get lost.
customer_reviews.author: Cheno

customer_reviews.title: Gift Cards Missing
customer_reviews.text: Two gift cards missing. Trying to get refund. No reponse.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Gift always welcome
customer_reviews.text: This gift card was for a very special granddaughter's Bridal shower. She had created two gift list registrations, but since I could not select from the remaining items on her list; I decided to let her choose. Amazon gift card a great choice and made her happy. I also liked the plain, simple greeting design that said LOVE and I added my own message inside card.
customer_reviews.author: Giovina

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE!!
customer_reviews.text: This became my favorite birthday card with the Amazon gift card inside. The birthday card is beautiful. I buy gift cards for my grandchildren because it is the best way to go when they are past 10 years of age! Also, this one allows you to start at $10.00 and above!
customer_reviews.author: MARTHA P.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon, you're the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: Needed last minute birthday gift. Ordered Birthday card with matching gift card on Friday at 6:45 PM and it was on my doorstep the next day, Saturday, at 4:44 PM....less than 24 hours!! Great quality card with matching cupcake pictured gift card, along with envelope. Shopping doesn't get any better or easier than this. And I know the recipient will love her gift!
customer_reviews.author: D Chandler

customer_reviews.title: I love my Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love my Amazon! My son lives in Seattle and so easy peezy to send gift cards. Today December 15th is his birthday. And he received the gift card in a nice lil birthday box. Thank you Amazon for all you do to make people’s lives a lil bit easier! JUS SAYN, HAPPY PRIME MEMBER FROM GILBERT ARIZONA
customer_reviews.author: PROUD TO BE A PRIME MEMBER

customer_reviews.title: The gift card
customer_reviews.text: i bought a baby gift card for my best friends grandchilds baby shower. I am ashamed to give her the card I received. It was bent really bad. I will be embarrassed to take it to the shower. Isn't there a way you can ship this card won't be bent? Please contact me about this matter so something can be done about before May 4, the day of the shower. Can you cancel the card I received and issue one in something that won't let the card get destroyed? Betty Mannis ssed ssed
customer_reviews.author: Nanabet

customer_reviews.title: Arrived In Perfect Condition
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised that this arrived in perfect condition! It arrived earlier than expected and is now on it's way to the recipient. This was a nice quality of card too. Simple and easy way of gift giving in this time when we can't gather in large crowds.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these gift card cards!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is an option on Amazon!! They come with the actual gift card attached to the card, and an envelope so all I need to do is write a message and mail it. So nice during graduation season when I have a bunch of graduation congrats cards to send. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: jclay

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts for the end of the year
customer_reviews.text: Every year we try to give all the teachers good gifts, but this last year, we decided to gift the teachers with Amazon gift cards, so they can buy it whatever they want/need. We like so much the idea, that at the end of this school year, we may do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel S. Coimbra

customer_reviews.title: This card reeks of patchouli
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why but this card smells strongly of patchouli. It is a physical card, gift card, and envelope that came inside a sealed envelope inside a sealed flat mailer. The mailer was OK but the envelopes and everything in them stinks!!!! What on earth?!? Whose basement did you find this in? Will the gift card even work? No idea. I'm having to air it out.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Green

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to order online. I will be giving these away as Christmas gifts. Don’t have to deal with the hustle and bustle in the crowded stores. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SPL

customer_reviews.title: Always a perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I love receiving and using Amazon gift cards. They are simple to use and can be used to purchase many different things.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: The Card was folded
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 birthday gift cards with greeting cards format. They were received on time but one of them being folded with obvious folding mark. The other card was nice and presentable as previous gift cards that I purchased. This is just kind of sad as the card that’s being folded is not presentable to give out as a present.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Y Chang

customer_reviews.title: Thank You
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for Christmas, I dig the simplistic design of the "Thank you" versions and the card had plenty of white space inside to let me put a heartwarming message for my loved ones. As a bit of forewarning for gift card buyers, I have heard that digital key versions of e-gift cards can be unreliable so I highly recommend just buying a physical card, plus it is nice perk to have something to open, it comes with it's own plain white envelope also. Thank you for taking the time to read my review. - John Mar
customer_reviews.author: Eli Warren

customer_reviews.title: Lots of choices
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren and other family enjoy receiving gift cards but I hate sending the ones from the grocery store, etc. as it seems as if you've gone to no trouble at all. The ones I order from the Amazon website are varied and cute and feel like you've put a little thought into itl
customer_reviews.author: fancynancy

customer_reviews.title: Mistakes happen, but All was Good in the End
customer_reviews.text: It took two-weeks to get the giftcard. The first mailing was a pair of flashlights. No gift card. Customer Service Rep, Liz in Florida, was amazing. She had a 2nd card sent. It arrived a couple of days before the wedding, so all was good. The card that came with the gift card was an extra bonus. I didn't have to go and buy a card too. Thanks again to Customer Service for working so wonderfully to fix the situation and follow up!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dalynn

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is great!
customer_reviews.text: The gift card came inside the greeting card which was in a plain white greeting card envelope. There was several other gifts in the package and I did not see the plain white envelope. I was looking for it but thought it was a piece of paper. I guess I thought they would put it in an Amazon envelope. Amazon was great! I canceled the card once I saw online that it was delivered and called them. I actually found it 2 days later, in the waiting to be put picked up but for obviously reasons, destroyed it.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynBoy

customer_reviews.title: Easy, safe birthday or general purpose gift.
customer_reviews.text: Used as a birthday gift to a relative who lives out of town and have no idea of what his likes, wants, or needs are. This allows him to pick his own present from anything Amazon offers, and it eliminates the hassle of my trying to come up with a gift that he may in fact not like, want, or need.
customer_reviews.author: Arch Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Good for gifts to Christmas and New Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these cards for Christmas and New Years' gifts. I like that they have a lot of different designs, you can choose what you want. Inside has an envelope and card for a gift, you need just write your greeting. Recommended as a universal gift
customer_reviews.author: liubov

customer_reviews.title: VERY appropriate!!
customer_reviews.text: These gift cards, looking like a Graduation Cap, were perfect! That classic bright blue is so familiar! $10 to $50 dollars are the parameters that these particular cards are offered for sale. I bought 2 of them and together they were just right.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyPetLady

customer_reviews.title: Everyone is on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: When ever I have a baby shower this is my go to gift. Living out of state makes it easy to send and everyone appreciates buying just what they need for their new little one. Plus who isn't on Amazon. Preparing to buy another as we speak.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Girl

customer_reviews.title: So Easy-Breezy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as Christmas gifts for my kids teachers . Loved that all I had to do was write a quick message inside, lick an envelope and send it to school. Super easy gift and we'll appreciated by them! Will definitely be purchasing these next year, too!
customer_reviews.author: rvanhorn

customer_reviews.title: Such an easy and efficient way to get and give a gift
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love an amazon gift card? You can buy almost anything your heart desires so it's really the perfect gift! To be able to order it with a free card (or tin or gift bag, depending on which option you choose) to be delivered right to you or to your recipient makes this ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: So easy - great gift to have lying around.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 15 of these and they are perfect for anything. I used them as holiday gifts for the staff in my apt building and they were a nice, neutral mix of black, gold and silver. Great for a holiday vibe without feeling denominational.
customer_reviews.author: Katie E Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Unevenly folded and cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: Card is folded unevenly and is not presentable as a wedding gift. Had to put the actual gift card in another card. Gift card itself is very cheap looking - looks fake. I have received many Amazon gift cards and never seen one so cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: sierra knapp

customer_reviews.title: the amounts not on card
customer_reviews.text: i bought a lot with different amounts. not sure when i give how much the amount is for
customer_reviews.author: jay coffsky

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea for Distant Friends and Relatives
customer_reviews.text: It's a Gift Card... what else can I say? I suppose the best part is it can be delivered to the recipient in minutes, so it's a great way to send last minute (or forgotten?) gifts! And the recipient gets to pick out whatever he/she wants, so there's no reason to worry if they'll like it... they always do!
customer_reviews.author: Grampy

customer_reviews.title: Happy to have
customer_reviews.text: Such a convenient and quick way to make sure your loved one is gifted in time to enjoy the occasion. More often than not, I use these gift cards for family members who appreciate Amazon services as much as I. Very successful outcome thus far.
customer_reviews.author: EnglishOnly

customer_reviews.title: Saving the gift for a rainy day
customer_reviews.text: I buy myself gift cards when I have "extra" money for those "tough times". I've had this for 2 years now and still don't think I need to use it unless I go crazy on Christmas presents!
customer_reviews.author: Emily K. Blalock

customer_reviews.title: Quick and accurate delivery - very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great way to say thank you or give gifts to co-workers, and others where a more personalized present is not appropriate. Used these for my team as holiday presents and just to say thanks. Also used for building super, teachers at kid's school, etc. The card personalization is possible and leaves room for a written message. Amazon gift cards are more convertible and usable then very specific ones (starbucks\best buy, etc) since this can be used for anything from music to groceries to electronics. Delivery was very quick and correct gift card amounts received.
customer_reviews.author: Ender W

customer_reviews.title: Did not arrive on time
customer_reviews.text: The gift card was fine and the greeting card was pretty but did not arrive the next day as promised and that’s why I ordered it. I ordered two and this one was late.
customer_reviews.author: karen atwood

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a $100 gift card for our daughters 16th birthday. She had no issues putting it into her account and spending it. It was a good deal with the birthday card. Will definitely be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: H. Theriault

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong with a gift card
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with a gift card! Got this for a coworker baby shower, could never guess how she would dress a baby. Now she can dress it up or buy diapers, her choice. The card was cute with baby design too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No note enclosed :(
customer_reviews.text: I sent an Amazon gift card to a coworker, and tracked the delivery so I know when she received it. Finally, 6 weeks later, I casually ask if she ever received it. The card that I had written with the order did not have my message on it. It's on the invoice: - Gift note: To All- Congratulations on the arrival of Ryan Andrew! Carrie- Hope you get something fun for yourself! Love Janet But the gift note was blank- she had NO idea who sent it! That was a bit embarrassing, and it was uncomfortable asking her. That's why there are only 2 stars- no excuse for not including the note.
customer_reviews.author: Janet G.

customer_reviews.title: do not buy more than one Amazon gift card at once
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible experience. I had to order several gift cards, at different prices. I received envelopes and card with zero indication of value. Apparently I now have to spend time I should be sleeping figuring out the value of all these cards, using the barcodes. I am completely disgusted and highly recommend avoiding bulk purchasing of Amazon cards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Physical Amazon money!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, a physical piece of amazon out of the digital world. This gift card is sturdy and flexible and bendy. I tried folding it in half and it snapped right back into place. The best part is a code on the back that gives you cash to use on amazon! A must have for any amazon enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: The card is simple and gives enough room to write. I was glad it doesn't have the price on it so it is a surprise to the person who receives it. I am giving them to teachers. I was able to put the amount I wanted verse the amounts they have in the general grocery stores. I like having a greeting card with a gift card and not having to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: D. Price

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: The card itself was gender appropriate, but not necessarily something I would purchase. However, it served the purpose for an impromptu baby shower. The gift card arrived the following day after ordering, which was very much appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: mnshops

customer_reviews.title: Too Big, Unless You'll Be Mailing It Out
customer_reviews.text: The greeting card is pretty big and not your typical gift card envelope. For my purposes, I couldn't use it but if you plan on writing a note on the card and mailing it out, it could be a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister in law's baby shower so she could get whatever she needed for the upcoming baby. She got a million gifts so I figured this would be great for diapers or necessities later on!
customer_reviews.author: Jesseca B

customer_reviews.title: The best gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Was a new year gift for my daughter’s babysitter. Instead of buying and her exchanging and all of this, that’s the best way! Was wrapped up nicely too so had a feeling of a gift and not just money.
customer_reviews.author: Billyboy

product_meta.title: Amazon.com Gift Card in a Greeting Card
feature_bullets: Gift Card is affixed inside a greeting card
Gift amount may not be printed on Gift Cards
Gift Card has no fees and no expiration date
No returns and no refunds on Gift Cards
Gift Card is redeemable towards millions of items storewide at Amazon.com
Scan and redeem any Gift Card with a mobile or tablet device via the Amazon App

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
